```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
icustays <- readr::read_csv(here('data/raw/tutorial_icustays.csv'))
icustays
```
```{r}
patients %>% select(subject_id, gender, anchor_age, anchor_year, dod) %>% write.csv(file=here('data/raw/tutorial_patients.csv'), row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
icustays %>% select(subject_id, hadm_id, stay_id, first_careunit, intime, outtime, los) %>% write.csv(file=here('data/raw/tutorial_icustays.csv'), row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
patients <- readr::read_csv(here('data/raw/tutorial_patients.csv'))
```

```{r}
patients[1:10, ] %>% write.csv(file=here('data/raw/tutorial_patient1.csv'), row.names = FALSE)
patients[11:20,] %>% write.csv(file=here('data/raw/tutorial_patient2.csv'), row.names = FALSE)
patients[21:30, ] %>% write.csv(file=here('data/raw/tutorial_patient3.csv'), row.names = FALSE)
patients[31:40, ] %>% write.csv(file=here('data/raw/tutorial_patient4.csv'), row.names = FALSE)
```
